issue_log: pytest-timeout plugin not found in virtual environment
Plugin is listed in pyproject.toml dev dependencies but not installed
Causes pre-commit hook to fail with unrecognized arguments error
solution: Install pytest-timeout plugin: pip install pytest-timeout>=2.2.0,<3.0.0
Verify plugin installation with: python -c "import pytest_timeout"
Alternative: Remove --timeout argument from .pre-commit-pytest-runner.py if timeout not critical
Ensure all dev dependencies are installed: pip install -e .[dev] or poetry install --with dev
False positive - pytest-timeout was already properly installed
Pre-commit test runner working correctly with 30-second timeout
